ISEBE LEMICIMBI YEKHAYA: UBUME






UBUME

IINKONZO



USHICILELO



AMAQUMRHU KAHULUMENTE



IZIXHOBO



UQHAGAMSHELWANO




Injongo yeSebe leMicimbi yeKhaya kukukhusela nokulawula iminqweno yabemi boMzantsi Afrika ngokubhekiselele kubume babo, ububona kunye namalungelo namagunya athile. Lilo elikhupha nelilawula uninzi lwamaxwebhu afunwa ngabemi, maxwebhu lawo afana nesatifiketi sokuzalwa, iincwadi-zazisi kunye nezatifikethi zomtshato.

Eli Sebe likwabonelela abemi boMzantsi Afrika ngentlaninge yeenkonzo, kanti nabemi bamanye amazwe abanqwenela ukundwendwela okanye ukuhlala kweli lizwe. Ezinye kwezo nkonzo zezi:
* iincwadi-zazisi
* amaxwebhu okundwendwela
* ubumi
* ukubhaliswa kokuzalwa nezatifiketi zabazelweyo
* iirekodi zabantwana abamkelwe kwabanye abazali (adoption)
* ukubhaliswa kokuzalwa nezatifiketi zabazelweyo
* ukubhaliswa kokubhubha nezatifiketi zababhubhileyo
* izilungiso kwiirejista zoluntu
* iivisa
* amaphepha-mvume obumi bethutyana
* ubumi obusigxina (abaphuma kwamanye amazwe)<li
